BASIC_CASE_INFORMATION.case_title: Kenya Power and Lighting Company Limited v Patrick Njane Mbugua & Another
BASIC_CASE_INFORMATION.subject_matter: Liability for a motor vehicle accident

PARTIES.plaintiff_appellant: Kenya Power and Lighting Company Limited

key_legal_issues: Determination of the true owner of the vehicle at the time of the accident
Assessment of damages awarded by the trial court

OUTCOMES.relief_granted: Kshs 800,000 in general damages and Kshs 63,860 in special damages

LEGAL_PRINCIPLES.precedent_value: Reinforces the application of ownership records in liability cases
LEGAL_PRINCIPLES.case_law_cited: Selle v Associated Motor Boat Co. [1968] EA 123

procedural_history: Appeal filed in the High Court (Civil Appeal No. 232 of 2016)

key_evidence: Medical evidence from Dr. Cyprus Oketch Okere (Pw2)
EVIDENCE_AND_DOCUMENTATION.expert_evidence: Medical evidence from Dr. Cyprus Oketch Okere (Pw2)
